mapper.insert: insert into signup_history ( member_id, subject_id, year ) values ( #{member.memberId}, #{subject.subjectId}, #{year} )
mapper.select: select h.signup_id, h.year, h.created_date, m.member_id, m.name, h.subject_id, s.subject_name from signup_history as h join member as m on m.member_id = h.member_id join subject as s on s.subject_id = h.subject_id

select h.signup_id, h.year, h.created_date, m.member_id, m.name, h.subject_id, s.subject_name from signup_history as h join member as m on m.member_id = h.member_id join subject as s on s.subject_id = h.subject_id where signup_id = #{signupId}
select h.member_id, h.year, m.name from signup_history as h join member as m on m.member_id = h.member_id where h.member_id = #{memberId} group by h.member_id,h.year,m.name
mapper.delete: delete from signup_history where member_id = #{memberId} and year = #{year}
